patient_info: Ventricular fibrillation,Pneumonia,Dyspnea,Exercise intolerance,Viral hepatitis,ST segment elevation,Cough
golden_diagnosis: Brugada syndrome 2,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 6,Brugada syndrome 5,Brugada syndrome 4,Brugada syndrome 8,Brugada syndrome 9,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 7,Brugada syndrome 3,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1
predict_diagnosis:
1. Viral myocarditis
2. Cardiomyopathy with arrhythmia
3. Acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)
4. Hepatitis-induced cardiomyopathy
5. Myocardial infarction with complications
6. Primary arrhythmia disorder with associated pneumonia
7. Inflammatory cardiomyopathy (e.g., giant cell myocarditis)
8. Drug-induced cardiomyopathy and arrhythmia
9. Pneumonia with sepsis-induced myocardial depression
10. Metabolic or genetic disorder with multi-system involvement (e.g., mitochondrial disease) leading to cardiomyopathy and respiratory symptoms.
